Modi.Modus0: Static - No blinking. Just plain old static light.
Modi.Modus2: Breath - Does the "standby-breathing" of well known i-Devices. Fixed Speed.
Modi.Modus3: Color Wipe - Lights all LEDs after each other up. Then turns them in that order off. Repeat.
Modi.Modus4: Color Wipe Inverse - Same as Color Wipe, except swaps on/off colors.
Modi.Modus5: Color Wipe Reverse - Lights all LEDs after each other up. Then turns them in reverse order off. Repeat.
Modi.Modus6: Color Wipe Reverse Inverse - Same as Color Wipe Reverse, except swaps on/off colors.
Modi.Modus7: Color Wipe Random - Turns all LEDs after each other to a random color. Then starts over with another color.
Modi.Modus8: Random Color - Lights all LEDs in one random color up. Then switches them to the next random color.
Modi.Modus9: Single Dynamic - Lights every LED in a random color. Changes one random LED after the other to a random color.
Modi.Modus10: Multi Dynamic - Lights every LED in a random color. Changes all LED at the same time to new random colors.
Modi.Modus11: Rainbow - Cycles all LEDs at once through a rainbow.
Modi.Modus12: Rainbow Cycle - Cycles a rainbow over the entire string of LEDs.
Modi.Modus13: Scan - Runs a single pixel back and forth.
Modi.Modus14: Dual Scan - Runs two pixel back and forth in opposite directions.
Modi.Modus15: Fade - Fades the LEDs on and (almost) off again.
Modi.Modus16: Theater Chase - Theatre-style crawling lights. Inspired by the Adafruit examples.
Modi.Modus17: Theater Chase Rainbow - Theatre-style crawling lights with rainbow effect. Inspired by the Adafruit examples.
Modi.Modus18: Running Lights - Running lights effect with smooth sine transition.
Modi.Modus19: Twinkle - Blink several LEDs on, reset, repeat.
Modi.Modus20: Twinkle Random - Blink several LEDs in random colors on, reset, repeat.
Modi.Modus21: Twinkle Fade - Blink several LEDs on, fading out.
Modi.Modus22: Twinkle Fade Random - Blink several LEDs in random colors on, fading out.
Modi.Modus23: Sparkle - Blinks one LED at a time.
Modi.Modus24: Flash Sparkle - Lights all LEDs in the selected color. Flashes single white pixels randomly.
Modi.Modus25: Hyper Sparkle - Like flash sparkle. With more flash.
Modi.Modus27: Strobe Rainbow - Classic Strobe effect. Cycling through the rainbow.
Modi.Modus28: Multi Strobe - Strobe effect with different strobe count and pause, controlled by speed setting.
Modi.Modus29: Blink Rainbow - Classic Blink effect. Cycling through the rainbow.
Modi.Modus30: Chase White - Color running on white.
Modi.Modus31: Chase Color - White running on color.
Modi.Modus32: Chase Random - White running followed by random color.
Modi.Modus33: Chase Rainbow - White running on rainbow.
Modi.Modus34: Chase Flash - White flashes running on color.
Modi.Modus35: Chase Flash Random - White flashes running, followed by random color.
Modi.Modus36: Chase Rainbow White - Rainbow running on white.
Modi.Modus37: Chase Blackout - Black running on color.
Modi.Modus38: Chase Blackout Rainbow - Black running on rainbow.
Modi.Modus39: Color Sweep Random - Random color introduced alternating from start and end of strip.
Modi.Modus40: Running Color - Alternating color/white pixels running.
Modi.Modus41: Running Red Blue - Alternating red/blue pixels running.
Modi.Modus42: Running Random - Random colored pixels running.
Modi.Modus44: Comet - Firing comets from one end.
Modi.Modus46: Fireworks Random - Random colored firework sparks.
Modi.Modus47: Merry Christmas - Alternating green/red pixels running.
Modi.Modus48: Fire Flicker - Fire flickering effect. Like in harsh wind.
Modi.Modus49: Fire Flicker (soft) - Fire flickering effect. Runs slower/softer.
Modi.Modus50: Fire Flicker (intense) - Fire flickering effect. More range of color.
Modi.Modus51: Circus Combustus - Alternating white/red/black pixels running.
Modi.Modus53: Bicolor Chase - Two LEDs running on a background color (set three colors).
Modi.Modus54: Tricolor Chase - Alternating three color pixels running (set three colors).
Modi.Modus56: Custom1 - Up to four user created custom effects.
